page.title: 09SHEEP FARMING IN EDDERTON
page.content: One of the main industies in Edderton is{sheep farming.}The main breeds of sheep are North Country Cheviots and Blackface.ln spring the lambs are born. When the lambs are 12 weeks old they are{vaccinated}against diseases. The shepherd has to check the flock regularly when the lambs are young to make sure everything is alright.In the summer the sheep are{sheared}and their wool is sold to the nearest wool market. After that there is a special symbol painted on to its skin so that the shepherd knows which sheep belong to him when they mix with other flocks on the hills.Then they are{dipped}to protect them from harmful insects.In autumn young lambs are{sold}at the local market and the sheep are dipped again.In winter the shepherd has to {check}on the sheep and{feed}them daily.A shepherd's life is a hard one.
